title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A story of wealth, love, and tragedy set in the Roaring Twenties.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A powerful story of racial injustice and moral growth.

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
description: A psychological thriller that explores the complexities of marriage.

title: The Girl on the Train
author: Paula Hawkins
description: A gripping mystery centered around a missing woman.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: A science fiction epic set on a desert planet with political intrigue and adventure.

title: Ender's Game
author: Orson Scott Card
description: A story of a young boy's journey to become a military commander in a futuristic world.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian society under surveillance.

title: The Da Vinci Code
author: Dan Brown
description: A fast-paced thriller involving a conspiracy surrounding a religious mystery.

title: The Hunger Games
author: Suzanne Collins
description: A dystopian tale of survival in a deadly competition.

title: Brave New World
author: Aldous Huxley
description: A novel exploring a futuristic society built on technology and conformity.
